Class Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • rt.Scene
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BDPathtracingBoxSphereGlass, BlinnSphere, Box, CameraTestScene, CSGCylindersAndSpheres, CSGScene, Dodecahedron, InstancingTeapots, InstancingTest, Mandelbrot, MirrorSpheres, PathtracingBoxCar, PathtracingBoxPeople, PathtracingBoxSphere, RefractiveSphere, TriangleTest

    public abstract class Scene
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines scene properties that need to be made accessible to the renderer.
